snippet: Finance officials said they had agreed on the basic principles on how to treat sick institutions, but not everyone was pleased with the compromises.
abstract: European Union finance ministers say they agree on basic principles on how to wind down ailing banks, but not everyone is pleased with the compromises.

byline.original: By ANDREW HIGGINS and MELISSA EDDY
byline.contributor: Andrew Higgins reported from Brussels, and Melissa Eddy from Berlin.

lead_paragraph: Finance officials said they had agreed on the basic principles on how to treat sick institutions, but not everyone was pleased with the compromises.

headline.main: E.U. Ministers Stagger Toward Banking Deal
headline.print_headline: E.U. Ministers Stagger Toward Banking Deal
